page.title: 19ARKWRIGHT COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: Arkwright Community Centre began in 1984 in the school building.It is very popular and it is doing much better than we expected.People have responded enthusiastically to the whole idea. Many activities go off such as 2 youth clubs,junior and senior,50+ club table tennis,dancing,keep fit,mothers and toddlers,slimming and many others. We organised a gala in July.Everybody took part.We had stalls and games and made a lot of money to help our centre.Everybody had a great time.Many people who go to the centre think it is a very good idea because they can take part in all the activities and meet friends and have a good time and before it started there was nothing to do.
